li.a: Ms. Winkelman & Mrs. Garber - P. E.
Teacher and Administrator Salary and Benefit Reports
District Report Cards and Annual Surveys

p.span: Delavan Schools wants to welcome you to the 2019-2020 school year and a web space for the Delavan community that continues to evolve. Last year, Delavan CUSD #703 replaced its decade-old website with a new web and eLearning platform that will bring our schools, students and teachers to the forefront of the 21st century.

There are many new features that we hope that you find useful on our new website. Located to the right is an Upcoming Events section and a Quick Links section for finding the District Calendar, Lunch Menu, Online Lunch Payment, and your students' grades. The website works in conjunction with the District App. These changes provide the most accurate, up-to-date information about the District as possible.
